trans-unit.source: Interoperates with the [IDispatch interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5).
trans-unit.target: 与 [IDispatch 接口](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)进行互操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.IReflect> interface is used to interoperate with the [IDispatch interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.IReflect>接口用于与进行互操作[IDispatch 接口](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.IReflect> defines a subset of the <xref:System.Type> reflection methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.IReflect> 定义的一个子集<xref:System.Type>反射方法。

trans-unit.source: Implementing this interface enables a type to customize its behavior when the object is being accessed from COM as an `IDispatch` object.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口，一个类型时从作为 COM 访问对象时，来自定义其行为`IDispatch`对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshalers.ExpandoToDispatchExMarshaler> class can be used to marshal an object that implements <xref:System.Reflection.IReflect> or <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Expando.IExpando> as a COM `IDispatch` object, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomMarshalers.ExpandoToDispatchExMarshaler>类可以用于封送对象实现<xref:System.Reflection.IReflect>或<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Expando.IExpando>作为 COM`IDispatch`对象，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to find.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: The binding attributes used to control the search.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制搜索的绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> object that corresponds to the specified field and binding flag.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定字段和绑定标志对应的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> object containing the field information for the named object that meets the search constraints specified in <paramref name="bindingAttr" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 对象，包含命名对象的符合 <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 中指定的搜索约束的字段信息。

trans-unit.source: The object implements multiple fields with the same name.
trans-unit.target: 该对象实现同名的多个字段。

trans-unit.source: The binding attributes used to control the search.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制搜索的绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> objects that correspond to all fields of the current class.
trans-unit.target: 返回与当前类的所有字段对应的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> objects containing all the field information for this reflection object that meets the search constraints specified in <paramref name="bindingAttr" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 对象的数组，包含此反射对象的符合 <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 中指定的搜索约束的所有字段信息。

trans-unit.source: The match is based upon a name.
trans-unit.target: 匹配基于名称。

trans-unit.source: Each field must have a unique name.
trans-unit.target: 每个字段必须具有唯一名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag specifies that non-public methods are included in the search.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志以指定在搜索中包含非公共方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag specifies that public methods are included in the search.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志以指定在搜索中包含公共方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to find.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: The binding attributes used to control the search.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制搜索的绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects corresponding to all public members or to all members that match a specified name.
trans-unit.target: 检索与所有公共成员对应或者与匹配指定名称的所有成员对应的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects matching the <paramref name="name" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 与 <paramref name="name" /> 参数匹配的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.IReflect.GetMember%2A> method retrieves an array of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects by using the name and binding attribute that correspond to all public members or to all members that match a specified name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.IReflect.GetMember%2A>方法检索的数组<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>对应于所有公共成员或与指定的名称匹配的所有成员使用的名称和绑定特性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The case of the specified name is observed or ignored, as specified by <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.IgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 观察到指定名称的大小写或将其忽略，所指定的<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.IgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The binding attributes used to control the search.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制搜索的绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects that correspond either to all public members or to all members of the current class.
trans-unit.target: 检索与所有公共成员或当前类的所有成员对应的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects containing all the member information for this reflection object.
trans-unit.target: 包含此反射对象的所有成员信息的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves an array of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects by using the binding attribute that corresponds either to all public members or to all members of the current class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检索的数组<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>通过使用对应于所有公共成员或到当前类的所有成员的绑定属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: It returns an array of all of the members defined for this object.
trans-unit.target: 它返回数组的所有定义此对象的成员。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object that corresponds to a specified method.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定方法对应的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to find.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: The binding attributes used to control the search.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制搜索的绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object that corresponds to a specified method under specified search constraints.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的搜索约束下检索与指定方法对应的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object containing the method information, with the match being based on the method name and search constraints specified in <paramref name="bindingAttr" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含方法信息的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象，匹配基于方法名和 <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 中指定的搜索约束。

trans-unit.source: The object implements multiple methods with the same name.
trans-unit.target: 该对象实现同名的多个方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to find.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: The binding attributes used to control the search.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制搜索的绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />, containing properties related to this method.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 的对象，包含与此方法相关的属性。

trans-unit.source: An array used to choose among overloaded methods.
trans-unit.target: 用于从重载方法中进行选择的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of parameter modifiers used to make binding work with parameter signatures in which the types have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 参数修饰符的数组，用于使绑定可与在其中修改了类型的参数签名一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object corresponding to a specified method, using a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> array to choose from among overloaded methods.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定方法对应的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象，使用 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 数组从重载方法中进行选择。

trans-unit.source: The requested method that matches all the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: 匹配所有指定参数的请求的方法。

trans-unit.source: The return value is a match based on the method name, <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> enum member, the kind of type conversion specified by the `binder` parameter, the overload, and the <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo> that describes the signature of the method.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是基于在方法名的匹配项<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>枚举成员，指定的类型转换的种类`binder`参数、 重载和<xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>描述方法的签名。

trans-unit.source: The object implements multiple methods with the same name.
trans-unit.target: 该对象实现同名的多个方法。

trans-unit.source: The binding attributes used to control the search.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制搜索的绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> objects with all public methods or all methods of the current class.
trans-unit.target: 检索与所有公共方法或当前类的所有方法相关的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> objects containing all the methods defined for this reflection object that meet the search constraints specified in <paramref name="bindingAttr" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象的数组，包含为此反射对象定义的符合 <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 中指定的搜索约束的所有方法。

trans-unit.source: The non-public attribute of `bindingAttr` is indicated only if public methods are returned.
trans-unit.target: 非公共属性`bindingAttr`指示仅返回公共方法时。

trans-unit.source: The binding attribute used to control the search.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制搜索的绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> objects corresponding to all public properties or to all properties of the current class.
trans-unit.target: 检索与所有公共属性或当前类的所有属性对应的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> objects for all the properties defined on the reflection object.
trans-unit.target: 在反射对象上定义的所有属性的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> object corresponding to a specified property.
trans-unit.target: 检索与指定属性对应的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to find.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The binding attributes used to control the search.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制搜索的绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> object corresponding to a specified property under specified search constraints.
trans-unit.target: 在指定搜索约束下检索与指定属性对应的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> object for the located property that meets the search constraints specified in <paramref name="bindingAttr" />, or <see langword="null" /> if the property was not located.
trans-unit.target: 找到的与 <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 中指定的搜索约束相符的属性的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 对象；如果没有找到此属性，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The object implements multiple fields with the same name.
trans-unit.target: 该对象实现同名的多个字段。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to find.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: The binding attribute used to control the search.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制搜索的绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />, containing properties related to this method.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 的对象，包含与此方法相关的属性。

trans-unit.source: The type of the property.
trans-unit.target: 属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: An array used to choose among overloaded methods with the same name.
trans-unit.target: 用于从同名的重载方法中进行选择的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array used to choose the parameter modifiers.
trans-unit.target: 用于选择参数修饰符的数组。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> object that corresponds to a specified property with specified search constraints.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的搜索约束下检索与指定属性对应的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> object for the located property, if a property with the specified name was located in this reflection object, or <see langword="null" /> if the property was not located.
trans-unit.target: 如果在此反射对象中找到了具有指定名称的属性，则为所找到的属性的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 对象；如果没有找到此属性，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves a <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> object corresponding to a specified property under specified search constraints.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检索<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>对应下指定的属性的对象指定的搜索约束。

trans-unit.source: A type array is used to choose from among overloaded methods.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型数组用于从重载方法中进行选择。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to find.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> invocation attributes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 调用特性之一。

trans-unit.source: The <c>invokeAttr</c> parameter may be a constructor, method, property, or field.
trans-unit.target: <c>invokeAttr</c> 参数可以是构造函数、方法、属性或字段。

trans-unit.source: A suitable invocation attribute must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定合适的调用属性。

trans-unit.source: Invoke the default member of a class by passing the empty string ("") as the name of the member.
trans-unit.target: 通过将空字符串 ("") 作为成员的名称传递来调用类的默认成员。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> bit flags.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 位标志之一。

trans-unit.source: Implements <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />, containing properties related to this method.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />，包含与此方法相关的属性。

trans-unit.source: The object on which to invoke the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 对其调用指定成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored for static members.
trans-unit.target: 对于静态成员，此参数被忽略。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that contains the number, order, and type of the parameters of the member to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 包含要调用的成员的参数数目、顺序和类型的对象数组。

trans-unit.source: This is an empty array if there are no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有参数，则这是一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: This array has the same length as the <c>args</c> parameter, representing the invoked member's argument attributes in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 此数组与表示元数据中被调用成员的参数属性的 <c>args</c> 参数具有相同的长度。

trans-unit.source: A parameter can have the following attributes: <see langword="pdIn" />, <see langword="pdOut" />, <see langword="pdRetval" />, <see langword="pdOptional" />, and <see langword="pdHasDefault" />.
trans-unit.target: 参数可以有下列属性：<see langword="pdIn" />、<see langword="pdOut" />、<see langword="pdRetval" />、<see langword="pdOptional" /> 和 <see langword="pdHasDefault" />。

trans-unit.source: These represent [In], [Out], [retval], [optional], and a default parameter, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性分别表示 [In]、[Out]、[retval]、[optional] 和默认参数。

trans-unit.source: These attributes are used by various interoperability services.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性由不同的互操作性服务使用。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> used to govern the coercion of types.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制类型强制的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: For example, <c>culture</c> converts a <see langword="String" /> that represents 1000 to a <see langword="Double" /> value, since 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<c>culture</c> 将表示 1000 的 <see langword="String" /> 转换为 <see langword="Double" /> 值，因为不同的区域性以不同的方式表示 1000。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数为 <see langword="null" />，则使用当前线程的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> array of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 参数的 <see langword="String" /> 数组。

trans-unit.source: Invokes a specified member.
trans-unit.target: 调用指定的成员。

trans-unit.source: The specified member.
trans-unit.target: 指定的成员。

trans-unit.source: The method that is to be invoked must be accessible and provide the most specific match with the specified argument list, under the constraints of the specified binder and invocation attributes.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的活页夹和调用属性的约束下，要调用的方法必须为可访问，并且提供与指定的自变量列表最具体的匹配。

trans-unit.source: A method is invoked if the number of parameters in the method declaration equals the number of arguments in the specified argument list, and the type of each argument can be converted by the binder to the type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 调用某个方法，如果方法声明中的参数的数目等于在指定的自变量列表中，参数的数目和每个自变量的类型可以转换由参数的类型联编程序。

trans-unit.source: The array of parameter modifiers passed to the <xref:System.Reflection.IReflect.InvokeMember%2A> method must contain a single parameter modifier.
trans-unit.target: 参数修饰符的数组传递给<xref:System.Reflection.IReflect.InvokeMember%2A>方法必须包含单个参数修饰符。

trans-unit.source: Only the first parameter modifier is considered when determining which argument needs to be passed by reference when exposed to COM.
trans-unit.target: 当确定哪些参数需要通过引用向 COM 公开时传递时，被认为仅第一个参数修饰符

trans-unit.source: The binder finds all matching methods, in accordance with the type of binding requested (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.InvokeMethod?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Reflection.IReflect.GetProperties%2A>, and so on).
trans-unit.target: 联编程序查找所有匹配的方法，根据请求的绑定类型 (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.InvokeMethod?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Reflection.IReflect.GetProperties%2A>，依次类推)。

trans-unit.source: The set of methods is filtered by the name, number of arguments, and a set of search modifiers defined in the binder.
trans-unit.target: 按名称、 数量的参数和一组绑定器中定义的搜索修饰符进行筛选的方法集。

trans-unit.source: After the method is selected, it is invoked, and accessibility is checked at that point.
trans-unit.target: 选择方法后，它调用的并且可访问性检查在该点。

trans-unit.source: The search may control which set of methods is searched based upon the accessibility attribute associated with the method.
trans-unit.target: 搜索可能来控制哪些方法集是基于与该方法关联的可访问性特性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod%2A> selects the method to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod%2A> 选择要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default binder selects the most specific match.
trans-unit.target: 默认的联编程序选择最精确的匹配。

trans-unit.source: Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 访问限制会忽略完全受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked through reflection whenever the code is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，是在私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性访问而完全受信任代码时，通过反射调用。

trans-unit.source: The following example obtains the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取的值<xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: More than one argument is specified for a field <see langword="set" />.
trans-unit.target: 为字段 <see langword="set" /> 指定了多个参数。

trans-unit.source: The field or property cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到此字段或属性。

trans-unit.source: The method cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到此方法。

trans-unit.source: A private member is invoked without the necessary <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 在没有所需 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission" /> 的情况下调用私有成员。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying type that represents the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.IReflect" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.IReflect" /> 对象的基础类型。

trans-unit.source: The underlying type that represents the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.IReflect" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.IReflect" /> 对象的基础类型。
